### Summary of Data

```{r}
head(births)
summary(births)

proportion <- sapply(births, function(x) { sum(is.na(x))*100/nrow(births) })
proportion


exclude <- c("fht","fwt")
include <- setdiff(names(births),exclude)

births <- births[include]


imp.births <- mice(births,method = 'cart' , printFlag=FALSE)

imp.births.complete <- complete(imp.births)







```
